name: Peperonata Sauce
recipeInstructions: 1. Heat the garlic in a saucepan, add the onio and garlic and cook for 5 minutes.
2. Add the tomatoes with their juice, the tomato puree, oregano and bay leaves.
3. Bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
4. Add the peppers and cook for another 10 minutes until they are soft.
6. Remove the bay leaves and serve with a bowl of grated Parmesan cheese.
